Summary: I saw a bright star like object moving across the sky approximate 150 to 200 ft high.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Holmfirth
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI had just got into bed and was looking out of my window when I saw a very bright star moving across the sky. I jumped up and moved to the window to watch what it was doing. There were no flashing lights as you would expect from a jet liner and it was moving at a constant speed away from my house. I kept watching it as it moved away and it got dimmer and dimmer before I lost I behind the trees in the distance. It wasn't a Chinese lantern either because the light given off was a brilliant white, not a flickering yellow. It wasn't flickering at all and the glare was consistent . I'd say it was between 150 to 200 ft in the air and around the same distance from my house.
